title: [Large-Scale] Blended Learning Program for Pre-University Physics Students

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level foundational knowledge of physics
context.additional_context: Physics foundational competency enhancement program for in-service professionals, offering a blended learning environment combining mobile devices and offline classes

learning_goals: Learners can understand and explain foundational physics concepts (mechanics, electromagnetism, thermodynamics, etc.) via MOOCs
Learners enhance problem-solving skills using technology-based feedback tools (clickers, etc.) in face-to-face instruction

Within 1 week, learners identify 3 physics principles (energy conservation, fluid dynamics, thermodynamics, etc.) related to real work environments (manufacturing processes/energy management) in team assignments, write reports including a 5-step problem-solving process (problem definition → principle application → solution design → simulation → verification) for each principle, and achieve 'excellent' ratings in ≥2 of 3 rubric criteria (clarity, practicality, creativity)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
